comments:
Build 20020426 (M5 patch 1)

1) Reopened a workbench that only had the resources perspective open
2) Opened the java perspective
3) Window->New Window
4) In new window, opened the debug perspective. 
5) Got the stack trace below...

I have not been able to reproduce it.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.RunToLineAction.init(RunToLineAction.j
ava:201)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.WWinPluginAction.initDelegate(WWinPluginAction.java:121)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.PluginAction.createDelegate(PluginAction.java:85)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.WWinPluginAction.refreshActionList(WWinPluginAction.java
:105)

	at 
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:1389)

a:64)

alog.java:193)

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)

I believe this is the bug we had where we relied on having an active page in a 
window when a workbench window action delegate was initialized.  Our actions 
have been updated to handle this case.
Please verify.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14326 ***
